title: Jijaji Chhat Par Hai
overview: This story revolves around Elaichi's eccentricities, Pancham's escapes, and Murari's dream of getting his daughter on track. Jijaji Chhat Per Hain, is a character-driven comedy, that will make you fall in love with a quintessential struggler Pancham, an unabashed free spirited Elaichi, and the frustrated father Murari.
